channel.title: I need some help,
channel.description: im useing project lol v3 and i was wondering, The HP skillcape wants to be used as a weapon and not a cape how can i fix this same with the Hood, How Can i edit the monsters drops,

item.title: I need some help,
item.dc:creator: @yugioh101 yugioh101
item.description:
@yugioh101 wrote:

I Figured Out How To Change Monster Drops,

Now When a player joins they spawn in a spicific spot i looked up to spawn cords and changed every 1 to what i wanted but when a new player joins they spawn in the old 1, but when they die and stuff then goto the new 1, help on that and

how do i reset the stats to max of 99?[br][size=1]Posted on: August 28, 2007, 01:55:47 PM[/size][hr]i Still need Help,[br][size=1]Posted on: August 28, 2007, 03:24:56 PM[/size][hr]Come on help me i need to know these new things, 1 how to make my max stat to 99 instead of 135, how to disable every command, and how to disable all the magics anicents and normal,

Read full topic

item.title: I need some help,
item.dc:creator: @I_Fix_I I Fix I
item.description:
@I_Fix_I wrote:

This is how you do it, first go to your item.java (Item). This is what you should see.

public static int capes[] = {7623,6111,6570,6568,4041,4042,1007

Just put the item ID (7623) in where it says cape. Just copy my example =)

item.title: I need some help,
item.dc:creator: @Pure_str433 Pure str433
item.description:
@Pure_str433 wrote:

go to ItemHandler and search for the Id of the skill cape, it would probably be in the weapon slot row, so delete it from
there and look for the cape row and put the id at the end of that.

Do that for the robin hood hat aswell

Read full topic
